name: Performage Acrobat
text:
You can only use this Skill once per Duel if your Deck (excluding the Extra Deck) contains 8 or more Level 4 or lower LIGHT and/or Spellcaster monsters.
1: During your Main Phase, shuffle 3 LIGHT and/or Spellcaster monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck, and then take 1 "Performage" monster from your Deck and either add it to your hand or send it to the Graveyard.
